# Changelog of fog-sakuracloud

## v0.1.1

- Add: Associate IP address to disk

## v0.1.0

- Add: Network resources
    - switch
    - router
- API change: create server requires options type.

## v0.0.4

- move lib/fog/bin/sakuracloud.rb from fog.

## v0.0.1-0.0.3

- divide from fog.
- supports
    - compute(with public switch only)
    - volume
